alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 06 at 1:45AM MST until December 07 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County including Interstate 25 between Wheatland and Chugwater. * WHEN...From late tonight through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
